mapper.select: select ort.rn, ort.no, ort.title, ort.content, ort.hit, ort.regDate, ort.userNo, ort.userName from (select rownum rn, ot.no, ot.title, ot.content, ot.hit, ot.regDate, ot.userNo, ot.userName from (select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date regDate, b.user_no userNo, u.name userName from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by no desc)ot )ort where rn >= #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}
select count(*) from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no
select b.no ,b.title ,b.content ,b.hit ,to_char(b.reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate ,b.user_no userNo ,u.name from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no}

select b.no ,b.title ,b.hit ,to_char(b.reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate ,b.user_no userNo ,u.name from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no
and b.title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by b.no desc
